CustomField.description: Check which journey stage the prospect is when it becomes a lead
CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(Contact_method__c), "Email - Campaign", "EDU", "Event - in-person", "EDU", "Invite", "EDU", "Chat", "EVAL", "Contact us", "EVAL", "Demo Request", "ASSESS", "Email - Direct", "EVAL", "Referral", "EVAL", "Trial", "EVAL", "Outbound", "OUT", "N/A")
CustomField.label: Journey Stage (deprecated)
